alert.note: Alert for Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:32PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Crook County through 900 PM MDT... At 832 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Lightning Flat to 9 miles northwest of Oshoto. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oshoto and New Haven around 845 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
